cast.overview: An FBI agent teams with the town's veteran game tracker to investigate a murder that occurred on a Native American reservation.
cast.title: Wind River

cast.overview: A hardened gun-for-hire's latest mission becomes a soul-searching race to survive when he's sent into Bangladesh to rescue a drug lord's kidnapped son.
cast.title: Extraction

crew.overview: As the Avengers and their allies have continued to protect the world from threats too large for any one hero to handle, a new danger has emerged from the cosmic shadows: Thanos. A despot of intergalactic infamy, his goal is to collect all six Infinity Stones, artifacts of unimaginable power, and use them to inflict his twisted will on all of reality. Everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment - the fate of Earth and existence itself has never been more uncertain.
crew.title: Avengers: Infinity War

crew.overview: The world is stunned when a group of time travelers arrive from the year 2051 to deliver an urgent message: Thirty years in the future, mankind is losing a global war against a deadly alien species. The only hope for survival is for soldiers and civilians from the present to be transported to the future and join the fight. Among those recruited is high school teacher and family man Dan Forester. Determined to save the world for his young daughter, Dan teams up with a brilliant scientist and his estranged father in a desperate quest to rewrite the fate of the planet.
crew.title: The Tomorrow War

crew.overview: Peter Quill, still reeling from the loss of Gamora, must rally his team around him to defend the universe along with protecting one of their own. A mission that, if not completed successfully, could quite possibly lead to the end of the Guardians as we know them.
crew.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3

crew.overview: A hardened gun-for-hire's latest mission becomes a soul-searching race to survive when he's sent into Bangladesh to rescue a drug lord's kidnapped son.
crew.title: Extraction

crew.overview: Between personal obligations and training for his next big fight against an opponent with ties to his family's past, Adonis Creed is up against the challenge of his life.
crew.title: Creed II

details.biography:
Chris Romrell is a stunt coordinator and performer. He is best known as the stunt double for Chris Pratt, notably portraying Star-Lord in Marvel Studios' "Avengers: Infinity War" and "Avengers: Endgame."

Romrell's collaboration with Chris Pratt extends beyond the Marvel Cinematic Universe. He served as Pratt's stunt double in the Amazon Prime series "The Terminal List," where he also took on roles as a stunt coordinator and fight coordinator for multiple episodes. His television credits include stunt performances in series such as "Hawkeye," "Watchmen," and "Doom Patrol." In "Hawkeye," he not only performed stunts but also appeared on-screen as Larper #1.

Beyond his work with Pratt, Romrell has contributed to various film projects. He appeared as a Russian Fighter in "Creed II" (2018) and as a contractor in "Wind River" (2017). His versatility is further demonstrated by his participation in the reality competition show "American Ninja Warrior," where he competed in multiple episodes between 2013 and 2014.
details.name: Chris Romrell
